body:
Why this has to be in the language?

As explained in the FAQ (https://golang.org/doc/faq#atomic_maps),
the use of concurrent maps is very limited.

And if you're really talking about lock-free highly concurrent maps,
it's better to publish your result as a go-gettable package first.

I highly doubt that this proposal will be accepted. If you just want to
know how to extend the language by modifying the compilers, you
might want to ask on the golang-dev mailing list.
